reviews.review_msg: This was definitely one of the hardest classes I've taken. Ralph gets into very, very specific and fine detail and there's lots of lecture readings, which makes it very easy to get the material mixed up. He might have a comprehensive understanding of the course, but doesn't understand how to teach. The class average is around 55%.
Very knowledgeable in neuroscience & circadian rhythms, very nice & helpful, humorous when you come to know Ralph in person! Running a lot of cool experiments in his lab.
